Posts.Content: Hi, I just wanted to add that I have been taking it since October, I take it last thing at night and have hardly any side effects, the only one being hot flushes which have nw calmed down to a couple a night. So far it's been a positive experience, I have the Wockhart brand which seemed to be the most recommended.

Posts.Content: I carried on running and did race for life last year between my third and fourth chemo sessions, even beat my 15 year old daughter to the line. We have done this race for the last 5 years and was determined to not miss one. Now I am thinking about training up again and doing the great north run this year, mead a goal to keep me training. Still got 13,Herceptin to go and on tamoxifen but the worst over so now looking forward. I definitely think keeping fit helped me through the treatment.
